title: Inclusive Simulation Leadership Training for Strengthening Science Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in science and management/leadership experience
context.additional_context: Simulation environments reflecting gender-related challenges experienced by female science leaders from diverse cultural backgrounds, with VR simulations executed in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can identify and execute at least three effective communication strategies within science organizational environments that exhibit gender stereotypes in VR simulations
Learners can propose at least one organizational policy improvement plan to enhance gender balance through project-based assessments
Learners can demonstrate at least two inclusive leadership skills required for collaborating with team members from diverse cultural backgrounds through peer feedback sessions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
